languages.text: "В нем нет подлости, в нем нет колебаний. Скажи, что я рехнулся, но это мой пес, и без него я теряю здравомыслие".
"There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."
languages.original_text: "В нем нет подлости, в нем нет колебаний. Скажи, что я рехнулся, но это мой пес, и без него я теряю здравомыслие".

traits.locale_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."
"There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."
"There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."
"There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."
"There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

languages.text: 「彼は卑劣でも、気まぐれでもない。狂人と言われても構わない。だけど、彼は俺の犬だ。彼がいなきゃ、俺は理性を失ってしまう」
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は卑劣でも、気まぐれでもない。狂人と言われても構わない。だけど、彼は俺の犬だ。彼がいなきゃ、俺は理性を失ってしまう」

languages.text: "In ihm ist keine Bösartigkeit, keine Wankelmütigkeit. Ich mag wahnsinnig sein, aber er ist mein Hund, und ohne ihn verliere ich jede Vernunft."
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: "In ihm ist keine Bösartigkeit, keine Wankelmütigkeit. Ich mag wahnsinnig sein, aber er ist mein Hund, und ohne ihn verliere ich jede Vernunft."

languages.text: « En lui, il n'y a nulle méchanceté, nulle inconstance. Traitez-moi de fou si vous le voulez, mais c'est mon chien, et sans lui, je perds la raison. »
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: « En lui, il n'y a nulle méchanceté, nulle inconstance. Traitez-moi de fou si vous le voulez, mais c'est mon chien, et sans lui, je perds la raison. »

languages.text: «No tiene un ápice de maldad ni indolencia. Le parecerá que estoy loco, pero es mi perro y sin él perdería la razón».
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene un ápice de maldad ni indolencia. Le parecerá que estoy loco, pero es mi perro y sin él perdería la razón».

languages.text: “它是那么温和，那么忠诚。可能是我疯了，但它是我的狗。失去了它，我也就彻底失去了理智。”
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: “它是那么温和，那么忠诚。可能是我疯了，但它是我的狗。失去了它，我也就彻底失去了理智。”

languages.text: "İçinde ne bir adilik ne de bir ahlaksızlık var. Varsın bana deli desinler ancak o benim köpeğim ve onsuz geriye bir amacım kalmıyor."
languages.original_text: "There is no meanness in him, no fickleness. Tell me I'm mad, but he's my dog and without him I lose all reason."

traits.locale_text: "İçinde ne bir adilik ne de bir ahlaksızlık var. Varsın bana deli desinler ancak o benim köpeğim ve onsuz geriye bir amacım kalmıyor."
